data.name: Happy Mining
data.detailed_description:
Happy Mining



Travel to the beautiful and colorful world of Sunny Island for relaxation and distraction found from everyday life.
The motivating game mechanics will draw you into the cheerful universe of Happy Mining.

Game world:

The bright and friendly world of Sunny Island is a small open world that can be freely explored.
In the course of the game you can find closed paths such as e.g. B. Unlock bridges and access to
to get new materials.
The goal of the game is the relaxed exploitation of resources in order to then use the yield to
Enlarge and automate workplaces. The world also invites you to explore.

Character / Skill system:

At the beginning of your journey, create a character that you can customize.
Gender, appearance and outfit are customizable from a wide range.
Your character can also improve their skills by purchasing new skills such as the
Increase in mining speed, mining efficiency, etc.

Game mechanics:

As a collector, you start mining different stones. The collected resources
you can then sell at the merchant to get new tools, skills or area unlocks
acquire.
Expand your workplace by building a mine, forge, smelter and more
Hire workers (NPC) to collect even more resources.

Story / Secrets:

The world of Happy Mining also contains a subtle backstory, but not in the
foreground. As you explore the world, in addition to degradable materials, you will also get open ones
to discover mysteries.

data.short_description: Discover a colorful world filled with resources in a single player mining adventure. Mine resources and expand your productions to earn even more gold.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit processor and operating system is required
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 1700
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 compatible
  • Additional Notes: With these requirements, it is recommended to play the game on low quality settings. Worse hardware is possible.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit processor and operating system is required
  • Processor: AMD RYZEN 5 53600 6 Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 570 Series
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 compatible
  • Additional Notes: With these requirements, it is recommended to play the game on low quality settings.
